data: {"page":1,"results":[{"backdrop_path":"/eoYqlqSKE381giHHxVafHa5eUDi.jpg","id":10846,"title":"The Tiger and the Snow","original_title":"La tigre e la neve","overview":"Love and injury in time of war. Attilio de Giovanni teaches poetry in Italy. He has a romantic soul, and women love him. But he is in love with Vittoria, and the love is unrequited. Every night he dreams of marrying her, in his boxer shorts and t-shirt, as Tom Waits sings. Vittoria travels to Iraq with her friend, Fuad, a poet; they are there with the second Gulf War breaks out. Vittoria is injured. Attilio must get to her side, and then, as war rages around him, he must find her the medical care she needs. In war, does love conquer all?","poster_path":"/6Vlvei2jNqQpyszqT2MUUNdKSgd.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[35,18,10749],"popularity":13.005,"release_date":"2005-10-14","video":false,"vote_average":6.8,"vote_count":470},{"backdrop_path":"/1gAIPtpuHSYWJ6PjF8r9jOJdSmG.jpg","id":58451,"title":"The Adventures of Pinocchio","original_title":"Le avventure di Pinocchio","overview":"Mastro Geppetto is a poor carpenter with no wife and no children. What Father Maurice doesn't know is that this type of devil will turn his life around.","poster_path":"/mij1XIGkqmFRRpKDlwHaz3tPoFS.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[35,14,10749],"popularity":12.694,"release_date":"1988-07-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.7,"vote_count":390},{"backdrop_path":"/aKNctt6HWvN152JQUf7JrbVxuQg.jpg","id":12776,"title":"Johnny Stecchino","original_title":"Johnny Stecchino","overview":"Good hearted but not very wordly-wise, Dante is happy driving the school bus for a group of mentally handicapped children, while feeling he is somehow missing out on life and love. So he is very excited when after nearly being knocked down by her car he meets Maria, who seems immediately enamoured of him. He is soon invited to her sumptuous Palermo villa, little suspecting that this is part of a plot. He bears an amazing likeness to Maria's stool-pigeon gangster husband and it would be convenient for them if the mobster, in the shape of Dante, was seen to be dead and buried.","poster_path":"/5scWsRsH5MUJEgXB52w0fM6I2gM.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"it","genre_ids":[35],"popularity":17.615,"release_date":"1991-10-24","video":false,"vote_average":7.3,"vote_count":993},{"backdrop_path":"/hvZmzx6ekvbPQo8F4bcARwS91FU.jpg","id":33821,"title":"Pinocchio","original_title":"Pinocchio","overview":"The enchanted story of Pinocchio.","poster_path":"/gOiT5YjhS7nQGoPOhaEaaEwjBxS.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[12,18,14],"popularity":13.582,"release_date":"2009-11-01","video":false,"vote_average":6.1,"vote_count":96},{"backdrop_path":"/exPj0a56H95IVJS3SDoUMOLGrcR.jpg","id":62118,"title":"Aurélie Laflamme's Diary","original_title":"Le journal d'Aurélie Laflamme","overview":"Aurelie Laflamme feels alone in the world, especially since her father's death five years ago. What if her father had been an alien who left Earth to return to his own planet? In that case, Aurelie would be an alien too. That would explain many things such as why she feels different from others, especially her mother, why she can't string two words together without making a mistake, and why boys really get on her nerves. Through the pages of her diary, Aurelie confides her joys and sorrows, successes and failures, love and friendships, and tries to find her place.","poster_path":"/nZqhjC0iUwYlRkOoIFlmmRaYD3i.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35,10751],"popularity":2.426,"release_date":"2010-04-23","video":false,"vote_average":5.4,"vote_count":12},{"backdrop_path":"/ydALCe5kg1SWAPYpaN7DDBmIN1E.jpg","id":186137,"title":"Le ali della vita","original_title":"Le ali della vita","overview":"The end of the 1950s: Rosanna returns as a music teacher to the claustrophobic confines of the convent boarding school from which she escaped as a young girl. Her happy, understanding ways, unconventional teaching methods and deep love of music soon win her the hearts of her girl pupils. Vithold, a nice young doctor, is also fascinated by Rosanna and gradually manages to convince her of his deep feelings for her. Rosanna encounters rejection and hatred from Alberta, the Mother Superior, who has a deep belief in strict discipline and order, as well as from her close associate Sister Federica, who is severe to the point of inhumanity.","poster_path":"/30H9vIvjvXhAtHMkQbRJwkXHW2e.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[],"popularity":2.339,"release_date":"2000-03-21","video":false,"vote_average":7.4,"vote_count":28},{"backdrop_path":"/n5oOMwzemLd81OARilBWDh2XR9A.jpg","id":53412,"title":"A Night in the Show","original_title":"A Night in the Show","overview":"Mr. Pest tries several theatre seats before winding up in front in a fight with the conductor.
